Blackstorm:

Blackstorm felt nervous and thought that the best would be follow 
Maxima's program "Kitkat, I... I think that would be better that 
I... Follow Maxima's commands... Perceptor indeed asked her to train 
me... I won't like to do problems to you so that would be the 
best... Perhaps later we can end our... friendly duel"

Blackstorm looked to Maxima and Kitkat, waitting what they said




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/24/03 1:17:01 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> raccoon7679@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > With lightening fast reflexes, she turned, jumped the ring roped 
in 
> > one leap, and ran towards Maxima. "YOU! You do not raise your 
voice 
> > to me young one. I do not care who you think you are. You will 
show 
> > the proper respect. I am the trainer here. You are the 
interloper. If 
> > you want to play games, then leave and do your programming 
> > elsewhere." she said, growling. Her optics red with fury, and 
the fur 
> > on the back of her neck standing up. "You will learn your place 
young 
> > one. In the pack, there is an order. And in that order, I am 
your 
> > supior officer."  She took a step back to recompose herself. 
> > 
> > In a more steady and lightly softer tone. "You, young one are 
clever, 
> > smart and well knowledged. But you have yet to really learn how 
to 
> > use this talent to it's fullest potential. When you have, then 
you 
> > shall be leader. Untill then, I am still higher ranked. You will 
show 
> > the rank respect if not the bot. Much like Hydras. He has my 
loyalty 
> > and respect. And I shall show that to all who are around me. You 
will 
> > do well to do the same."
> > 
> > She turned and went back to the ring. Her arm still holding her 
> > stomach.
> > 
> > 
> 
> Maxima's optics glowed. But she would not scrap the bot who just 
seriously 
> insulted her. "It is you who have crossed the line. Hydras 
deserves my 
> loyalty for many reasons. YOU however," her voice still eriely 
calm but 
> obviously there was hint that she did not appreciate what KitKat 
just did, 
> "underestimate me. I am by NO means young. I would be surprized 
that you 
> would be older than I. Rodimus himself is much younger than I. 
#2... 
> Perceptor has placed ME in charge of Blackstorm. I do believe that 
you have 
> over stepped your bounds. If I am correct, I don't recall Hydras 
giving you a 
> superior ranking let alone charge. Flicker has charge of this 
place. As does 
> Perceptor. Now... if you will so kindly step aside & allow me 
finish 
> Blackstorm's programming." Her crimson optics glared at Kitkat. 
She knew at 
> the beginning that this one would be a problem. She was right. So 
many 
> wanting so much. Sounded far too familiar. Sounded much like 
Starscream.
